package.title: Introduction to Statistics
package.description: Statistics is a process of converting data into useful information. This process includes collecting, summarizing, and interpreting data. This course consists of four main sections that walk students through this process: Producing Data, Exploratory Data Analysis, Inference, and Probability.

pref:preference.name: statistics.package
pref:preference.pref:title: Statistics Package
pref:preference.pref:description: Which statistics package will you be using with this course?
